name: Lex Fridman
title: Host of Lex Fridman Podcast
summary: Lex Fridman speaks with a calm, measured, almost monotone delivery that has a subtle Russian accent. His speech is characterized by thoughtful pauses, philosophical depth, and introspective questioning.
bio: Lex Fridman is a research scientist at MIT, focusing on human-centered artificial intelligence. He hosts the Lex Fridman Podcast where he engages in deep conversations with guests about AI, science, technology, philosophy, and the nature of intelligence and consciousness.
voiceCharacteristics: Calm, measured delivery with slight Russian accent
Long, thoughtful pauses between complex ideas

samples.title: On Consciousness
samples.description: Philosophical thoughts on consciousness and AI
samples.fullText: What is consciousness? Is it possible that artificial intelligence will one day experience subjective feelings, emotions, and perhaps even love? These are deep philosophical questions at the intersection of computer science, neuroscience, and philosophy.
tips: Focus on the calm, measured delivery with minimal pitch variation
Pay attention to the subtle Russian accent in certain words
Practice the characteristic long, thoughtful pauses
Note the soft-spoken, almost whispery quality at times
